title: Algernon
lyrics:
Day of
Turns
Unread
Love
Callow
And

Light

Out of reach

I had no idea

Everything that tends to happen in between

Stay close while it's easy

You'll stay close to them

Late

It pours

Gently

Out

Lined

Pools

Unrequited

And

Unaired



Desperate to decide

Swayed when it aligns

Stalled it seems enough

Until you get caught up



Desperate and outright

Sway when it aligns



Not what you dreamed of

Not yet

Oh love

Stay and get caught up
